mapper.select: select specifications.spec_id, specifications.spec_name, specifications.good_id from specifications left join goods on specifications.good_id = goods.id where good_id = #{goodId}

select specifications.spec_name, b.spec_val_name from specifications left join ( select spec_value.spec_val_id, spec_value.spec_val_name, spec_value.spec_id from (select spv.spec_val_id from sku_spec_val spv where sku_id = #{skuId}) a left join spec_value on a.spec_val_id = spec_value.spec_val_id ) b on b.spec_id = specifications.spec_id
